question:
Which of the following statements are correct regarding grasslands?
1. Temperate grasslands are found on either side of the equator and extend till the topics.
2. Tropical grasslands are found on the interior side of the continents in mid latitude region.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: Temperate grasslands are found on either side of the equator and extend till the topics whereas tropical grasslands are found on the interior side of the continents in mid latitude region.
